snippet.title: The Sandbox Mobile - Official Trailer (iPhone, iPad, Mac, Android and Amazon)
snippet.description:
The Sandbox Mobile (http://www.thesandboxgame.com) is a world crafting game offering you to play God and manipulate over 230+ physics elements presented in 2D pixel blocks that can interact with each others. Released on iOS, Android, and PC for Steam, the hugely popular user generated pixel content game has been downloaded more than 18 million times!

★ DOWNLOAD (FREE) ★  
All Platforms: http://thesandboxgame.com/download

Play God to create worlds & life, or destroy everything with a tap of your finger in The Sandbox! As featured in: BEST OF WORLD-BUILDING GAMES (App Store), BEST OF GAMES: HIDDENS GEMS (App Store) and TOP GAMES – IF YOU LIKE MINECRAFT (App Store)
Official Trailer of "The Sandbox" game Blackberry, Amazon, Android, iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad and now Mac!!! 
http://www.thesandboxgame.com

★ DOWNLOAD (FREE) ★ 
iOS: http://bit.ly/thesandboxgame
Android: http://bit.ly/thesandboxgame-android
Mac: http://bit.ly/thesandboxgame_mac
Amazon: http://bit.ly/thesandboxgame-amazon
Blackberry: http://bit.ly/thesandboxgame-blackberry

★ GAME INFOS ★
The Sandbox is a unique powder / falling sand game that provides you with your very own "physics sandbox" and gives you god-like powers, right on your Blackberry, Amazon, Android, iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad or Mac!
Imagine creating your own universe (complete with amazing Pixel Art), composing your own music, and much, much more. The universe is yours to create or destroy, and the only limit is your imagination!

★ FOLLOW US ★
Website: http://www.thesandboxgame.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/TheSandboxGame
Facebook: http://facebook.com/TheSandboxGame
#TheSandbox #Pixel #Tutorial #Mobile #Game #UGC
